last_episode_to_air.name: 101 Ducks.
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the season finale, Taskmaster Reggie Watts crowns a winner after making the contestants knock down a bunch of rubber ducks, do something surprising with a potato and inflate a balloon.

name: Taskmaster
overview: Reggie Watts hosts a game show like no other, where contestants compete in a series of incredibly taxing and strange challenges under his harsh judgment.

episodes.name: Physics.
episodes.overview: Taskmaster Reggie Watts challenges contestants to play basketball without using their hands, finagle their way into a onesie and record themselves doing something that will look impressive when played backward.

episodes.name: Ebony.
episodes.overview: The contestants must impress Taskmaster Reggie Watts by painting a portrait of a horse while riding a horse, speaking in accents other than their own and competing to see who can make the longest continuous noise.

episodes.name: Bubbles.
episodes.overview: Contestants must order a pizza without saying certain words, camouflage themselves in a photograph and create balloon chains without looking.

episodes.name: Die, die, die.
episodes.overview: Taskmaster Reggie Watts orders the contestants to make a block of ice disappear as fast as they can, impress an actual mayor in less than 20 minutes and transport only blue M&M's from one bowl to another while wearing boxing gloves.

episodes.name: Magnets & Magic
episodes.overview: The contestants are ordered to throw something into something, find their way to a microwave in as few steps as possible and toss an egg through a basketball hoop and catch it.

episodes.name: Engineering.
episodes.overview: Taskmaster Reggie Watts challenges contestants to create "the best flag meal," construct a miniature bridge that can support a potato and arrange an assortment of items so that they can be held in one hand.

episodes.name: Hostage.
episodes.overview: The contestants must figure out what their first task is from a series of clues, record the most incredible footage they can and stack the lowest number of donuts on a stick.

episodes.name: 101 Ducks.
episodes.overview: In the season finale, Taskmaster Reggie Watts crowns a winner after making the contestants knock down a bunch of rubber ducks, do something surprising with a potato and inflate a balloon.
